text: hithamuko mashime wena loku wadak aawa kiyala, ethakota atam oya wadeta salli aran thibba nam "uu eekatath salli gaththa " kiyala minissu wena ekekta katha karanawa.
me nisa kamaya duralime shakthiya thaman thula athi karaganime uthsahayaka yedime awashyathawaya budurajanan wahanse mehidi pahadadili kara di thibenawa.
2015 janawari 8 wenida janathawa labadunna janawarama sarthakayi kiyala oppu karanna oone.
eeka nisa mehema kiyala maruwenynya..

rajya paripalana sewayata ayath samanya niladhariyaku wana gamini sedara senarathge namatath ohuge birinda wana thennakon mudiyanselage kumari githa gunarathnage namatath ohuge puthage namatath me wana wita athi samastha chanchala ha nishchala depalawala watinakama rupiyal koti 70 ikmawanawa.
eewa kiyawimata tharam rasawathwima sathutak.

fedaral kramaya yatathe rata bedimak sidu nowana bawa suprim usawiye winisuruwarun thidenaku thinduwak magin prakasha kara thibena bawath me nisa fedaral magin rata dekada we yayi sitha thaman athulu pirisata ella karana chodana padanam wirahitha bawath hethema kiya.
me nisama manda welawak kalpana kala riyadura ee gampathi thana amathamin "oya liyuma mata denna mama meka ape di.
mudal mandalaya mema thiranaya wetha elambaime di danata pawathna saha apekshitha deshiya saha goliya aarthika wardhanayan pulul lesa salaka atha.
sar jefri letan owunge pa්radhana ana dena niladhariya wiya.

pragnya ( thrilakshanaya thulin lokaya ha sathwaya pilibanda danima ha niwan awabodhaya )yana guna hathara janatha hadawathata kawima thulin ema rajyaya nirbhaya kshema bhumiyak bawata path wana bawada sandahan we.
wishwaye abirahas sansiddhin gana danata wada honda awabodhayak ewita lokayata laba gatha haki wewi.

sandalu thalawe sita
usas pelata peni sitimata nam samanya pela samath wiya yuthu weyi.
nomarena keneku lesa jiwath wenna epa...
eheth wenaskam da thibenawa.
ethakota sinhalayage bahuthara balaya binda watenawane.
igena gaththa mahathmayek..”

mita amatharawa anthar jathika kantha krikat shrenigathakirimwala idiriyata paminimata nayika shashikala siriwardhana, chamani siriwardhana, chamari athapaththu saha dipika rasangika samathwa sitithi.loka kusalana tharagamalawe di shri lanka kridikawange pithiharambaa layisthuwa wenaskirima sarthaka athhada balimak bawa wanesa mahathmiya pawasuwaya.'me tharagamalawe di warin wara ape kridikawange pithiharambaa layisthuwa wenas kirimen owunge niwaradi sthana handunaganime awasthawa udawuna.
boho denekuta eya labagatha nohaki ya.
eya anthimata mokada kale?”

giruwaye maha pragnyaya nam wirudawaliya lath mahacharya mandis rohanadhirayange 2 wani guna samaru uthsawaya eeye (22) janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage pradhanathwayen bandaranayaka sammanthrana shala parishraye di pawathwini.

eheth warshika gamuda uthsa­waya ha ada­lawa thanu gamma­naya sandaha namak dime di lankawe siya­lu­de­na­tama saha­bhagi wiya haki aaka­ra­yata dina­mina pathraya anu­gra­ha­yen “gamata namak” nam wu thara­ga­yak pawa­thwuye ewans kure maha­thage yoja­na­wa­kata anu­waya.
rawita kriyathmaka wena nithiyama nisa rajapaksha rejimaye ayatath kriyathmaka wenne deshapalana paliganim kiyana lebalaya alawannath bari wenawa.

mita eksath jathika pakshaye kolambaa pa්rabala parlimenthu mantha්riwarayekuge sahayada laba dena bawata thorathuru wartha we.”
